Reading group 21 Fall

Book to read

  • Bauschke H H, Combettes P L. Convex analysis and monotone operator theory in Hilbert spaces, New York: Springer, 2nd Edition, 2017.

Time and location

  • Time: 19:00 - 22:00 Friday
  • Room: TBD

Schedule

  • NOT every section has to be covered, see the and of this page.
  • People who pick Chp12 or Chp19 have to choose another one to read.
  • The main force of this reading group would be Jie Gao, Ke Zhang and Weike Zhao, others are welcome to join the presentation.
  • Please click this link to choose the slot you prefer, then refresh this page (it takes some time for this page to be updated).
  • One slot can be chosen by more than one person, then you should discuss the arrangement of centent yourselves.

Contents that can be ignored
